title: Problem with changing password, and logging into the game.
body:
So recently (about 3 days ago), you have made it a requirement to change one's password, in order to keep playing. My problem is that when I want to go and change the password, it says that the password I type in is "incorrect". The thing I find weird is that in order to change your password you need to log in to the website itself (the account I'm typing with currently), and that password works.
-I am 100% sure that the password I am typing in is correct. 
Can someone help me maybe reset my password, or do anything to fix the problem?

Also I cannot get my email verified and changed since every time I ask the system to send me a verification email, I am not getting one... This has been a problem the last 3 days.

Thank you for looking into the issue :-)

replies.body: A password not working is usually ar esult of being logged into a different region on the patcher, so make sure you are on the correct one!  We are happy to help with any account recovery and informaiton update as well.  Fill out an [account recovery ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416)  and our account team will help with that.  Hang tight, and we'll respond asap!
